item.description:
Specific Topic: Favorite Techniques

You don't have to know NLP to come to this workshop and learn (or even change), you just have to come with an open mind.  If you are an experienced practitioner, I do invite you to bring your favorite technique to demo.  let's show everyone how cool and useful NLP can really be.

What I have in mind -

  • Like/Dis-Like - Do you have a food that you would like to like less? (or more)
  • Belief Change Work - How about taking a limiting belief and making it go away or forming a new, resource belief that you wish you had.
  • Anchors - If we have time, I love teaching and using anchors


Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: NLP Meetup - Methuen - Favorite Techniques
